results.title: Simvastatin attenuates axonal injury after experimental traumatic brain injury and promotes neurite outgrowth of primary cortical neurons.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ activated @GENE_AKT1 @GENE_24185 @@@Akt@@@ and @GENE_MTOR @GENE_56718 @@@mTOR@@@, inactivated @GENE_GSK3B @GENE_84027 @@@GSK-3beta@@@ and dephosphorylated @<m>DISEASE_Adenomatous_Polyposis_Coli</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011125 @@@APC@@@ in the injured PCNs.
